# title: "econobits"
---

![](images/landing_images/keynes.png){#landing-image}

```{=html}
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const images = [
    'images/landing_images/keynes.png',
    'images/landing_images/pacman.png',
    'images/landing_images/smith.png',
    'images/landing_images/tetris.png',
    'images/landing_images/zelda.png'
  ];
  
  const today = new Date();
  const dayOfYear = Math.floor((today - new Date(today.getFullYear(), 0, 0)) / 1000 / 60 / 60 / 24);
  const index = ((dayOfYear - 1) % images.length);
  const selectedImage = images[index];
  
  const imageElement = document.getElementById('landing-image');
  if (imageElement) {
    imageElement.src = selectedImage;
  }
});
</script>
```
